name: Agile Stance
desc: You take on a stance focused on mobility, intent on covering ground quickly.

abilities.name: Nimble
abilities.effect: Attacks made against you on your _Turn_ have _Disadvantage_ against you.

abilities.name: Dart
abilities.effect: You may immediately _Move_ as if it was your _Turn_, and may use _Mobility_ _Maneuvers_ as if it was your turn.

name: Rallying Stance
desc: You adopt a supportive stance, focusing on helping allies while catching your breath.

abilities.name: Encouragement
abilities.effect: At _Respite_ you may use up to 2 _Momentum_ of [_Inspiring_] Manuevers as if it was your _Turn_, paying no costs.

abilities.name: Rally
abilities.effect:
Choose one:
* You or the Target gains 1 _Guard_.
* You or the Target _Recovers_.
* You or the Target clears 5 _Stun_.

If you target an ally, you may also clear 1 _Stun_.

adjust_notes: 2 free Momentum, minus a bit for Pacifist, but Rally is really good.

name: Hostile Stance
desc: A stance focused on overwhelming offense and unleashing a barrage of attacks.

abilities.name: Aggression
abilities.effect: You may use any number of Attacks on your _Turn_. Additionally, your first Attack on your _Turn_ gains [_Discount_ 2].

abilities.name: Press
abilities.effect: After resolving all other effects, deal 3 _Stun_ as a separate effect. If you Missed, instead deal 4 _Stun_.

adjust_notes: Gets 2 Momentum for attacks, toss in another 2 for Hostility.

name: Open Stance
desc: A perfectly balanced stance, leaving no obvious openings while granting no obvious advantages.

name: Focused Stance
desc: You adopt a patient stance, gathering your energy to unleash a powerful effect.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.effect:
At the start of the Round, choose an Ability and any Target for it, announcing both. On your Turn, gain 6 _Momentum_ that may only be used on the chosen Ability against the chosen _Target_. You may not willingly spend Movement until your _Turn_, and may not leave your current _Arena_ until use the chosen Ability.

Additionally, at _Respite_, gain _Concentrating_.

adjust_notes: Charge is very good, but Limited Mobility is very bad.

name: Guarded Stance
desc: A stance focused on block, providing an unparalleled ability to keep yourself safe.

abilities.name: Defensive Focus
abilities.effect: Attacks against creatures that have not attacked you this _Round_ have _Disadvantage_.

abilities.name: Raise Guard
abilities.effect: Choose an enemy. You have _Advantage_ on all _Defense Rolls_ against them this _Phase_.

adjust_notes: Assumes Active Block triggers every other phase, with a little extra for Raise Block.

name: Skirmisher Spirit
desc: You direct your spirit to strike, focusing on mobility and getting close.
effect: On your Turn, move towards the nearest hostile creature and _Engage_ it if possible. Attack them once or, if you cannot, use _Concentrate_. You may use any Abilities that help accomplish this task.

name: Directed Spirit
desc: You give your spirit a specific order to strike, focusing on a singular enemy.
effect: Upon entering this Stance, choose an Attack and a Target. On your Turn, use that Attack against said Target at the most appropriate Range or, if you cannot, _Concentrate_. You may use any Abilities that help accomplish this task.

name: Sprinting Spirit
desc: You direct your Spirit to a specific location and they do their best to get there quickly.
effect: When you choose this Stance, choose a destination. On your _Turn_, move as close to the Destination as possible. Your Spirit may not Attack, but may use any Abilities that help accomplish this task, and may use _Armament_ _Manuevers_ after reaching their destination.

abilities.name: Nimble
abilities.effect: Attacks made against you on your _Turn_ have _Disadvantage_ against you.

name: Questing Spirit
desc: Your Spirit takes on a quest, doing everything in its power to complete it.
effect: When you choose this Stance, choose a quest; typically, this will be an Ability and a Target. On your _Turn_, attempt to complete the quest to the best of your ability.

name: Surviving Spirit
desc: Your Spirit focuses on survival, focusing almost entirely on defense.
effect: On your _Turn_ you may _Retreat_. Your may not Attack, but may use _Recovery_ or _Defensive_ Abilities on your _Turn_.

name: Spiritual Essence
desc: Your Spirit does not take on a corporeal form, instead assisting you with its magical reserves.
effect: Automatically enter this _Stance_ if you are not _Manifested_ at _Respite_. You do not take a _Turn_, but gain 2 _Craft Momentum_ at _Respite_.
